Message.Title: Walmart Employees Chase Down Thief, Beat The F Out Of Him
Message.Msg: not the shoplifter. This thief was an agitator from UFCW. He wanted to get a cut of the employees' paychecks. And he wanted some of every paycheck they would get from now on. They just meant to teach him a lesson, but he was so fat from living high on ill-gotten gains that he choked on his triple-chin and passed away.
